section.title: TeX Live
section.para: Since release 15.09 there is a new TeX Live packaging that lives entirely under attribute texlive.

listitem.para: For basic usage just pull texlive.combined.scheme-basic for an environment with basic LaTeX support.

You can list packages e.g. by nix-repl.
$ nix-repl nix-repl> texlive.collection-<TAB>
Some tools are still missing, e.g. luajittex;
some apps aren't packaged/tested yet (asymptote, biber, etc.);
feature/bug: when a package is rejected by pkgFilter, its dependencies are still propagated;
in case of any bugs or feature requests, file a github issue or better a pull request and /cc @vcunat.
